page.title: 17In Business
page.content: Mr. Brock has been in business in the area for twelve years. He makes turned parts, spindles, shafts, screws etc. to customers' specifications. He employs six people and makes equipment for Mysons,S.T.C., Rainham Timber, Crittals, I.W.S. and various local customers. Most of his customers lives within a ten mile radius but he does also work for customers three hundred miles away. There is a small firm of woodworkers who employ four people. They use hand and folding tools. They make interior shop fittings. Doe's is the largest firm in the area. It was established about 100 years ago expanding from a blacksmiths to a concern selling farm and garden machinery. They employ about 35 people, many part time workers who come from as far away as Chelmsford.
